themes: improved marketing and communication of application periods
dedicated grant opportunities for marginalized groups
inclusion of ethnic minorities, people with disabilities, and gender/sexuality minorities
key_phrases: application times to be better marketed and announced
grant opportunities to be reserved for folks of ethnic minorities
folks of gender and sexuality minorities
barriers_identified: lack of awareness of application times
insufficient reserved opportunities for marginalized groups
solutions_proposed: better marketing and announcement of application times
reserve some grant opportunities for ethnic minorities
reserve some grant opportunities for folks with disabilities
reserve some grant opportunities for gender and sexuality minorities
